title.en: Merched y Wawr Peniel Branch on a trip to celebrate T Llew Jones
title.cy: Cangen Peniel o Ferched y Wawr ar daith i ddathlu T Llew Jones .

description.en:
Taith gan Gangen Peniel o Ferched y Wawr i ddathlu canmlwyddiant ers geni T Llew Jones ym mis Medi 2015.
Rhes flaen – Sue Hughes, Brenda Davies, Meryl Davies, Frances Evans, Mary Thomas, Catrin James, Ann Griffiths, Betty Davies, Gill Evans, Betty Howells a John Meirion Jones, oedd yn arwain y daith
Rhes Gefn – Myra James, Eileen Jones, Janice Williams, Eirlys Davies, Mary Howell, Marian Jones, Janet James, Betsan James, Amanda Evans, Enid Lewis, Ann Loughran
